Click to read more about: SPEECH

strong.span: The Eastern Local School District mission, in partnership with our community, is to ensure a safe nurturing environment where all students can reach their potential. To achieve this mission, we have a clear set of achievable goals and the support of all stakeholders. All resources - human, fiscal and material - must be concentrated on the overall continuous improvement of student learning.

span.span: It is a privilege to be your superintendent and to serve the students, staff, and community of the Eastern Local School District. I strive to create a safe learning environment for every child that steps though our doors each day.
We are constantly looking for ways to improve the educational processes that will assist your student to become the best that he/she can become.
